title: Grilled Tenderstem with chilli dressing & poached eggs

ingredients.item: 300g Tenderstem broccoli, trimmed, thicker stalks split
1 tsp Chiu Chow chilli oil, or to taste
2 British Blacktail Medium Free Range Eggs
250g pack LoveLife Spelt, Quinoa, Red Rice & Wild Rice
2 tbsp roasted cashew nuts, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Place a griddle pan over a medium heat. Once hot, add the broccoli, in batches if necessary, and sprinkle with a little water. Cook for about 6-8 minutes, turning from time to time, until tender and beginning to char in places.
Meanwhile, mix together the chilli oil, sesame oil, soy sauce, vinegar and garlic, then beat in 1 tbsp water.

Fill a wide shallow pan with water and bring to a gentle simmer. Gently crack in the eggs. Cook for 3 minutes, until the whites are set. Lift out with a slotted spoon. Cook the grains according to pack instructions, then divide between plates. Top with the broccoli and poached eggs, drizzle with the dressing and sprinkle with the cashews.
